keyMoments.title: Zoro vs Hody Jones - Underwater Battle
keyMoments.description: Zoro decides to hold off Hody Jones in an underwater battle while the others escape from Ryugu Palace, demonstrating his post-timeskip strength despite the significant disadvantage.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Zoro's willingness to fight at a severe disadvantage to protect his crewmates and demonstrates his growth during the two-year timeskip.

keyMoments.title: Zoro Uses Ittoryu: Yakkodori
keyMoments.description: Zoro demonstrates his new one-sword style technique Yakkodori, launching a crescent moon-like projectile of compressed air powerful enough to critically injure one of Hody's subordinates.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Zoro's new post-timeskip techniques and his ability to fight effectively even underwater.

keyMoments.title: Zoro's Strategic Leadership
keyMoments.description: As the palace floods, Zoro instructs Usopp and Brook to help free Neptune's soldiers, showing his strategic thinking and concern for innocent lives.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Zoro's growth and his role as unofficial first mate of the Straw Hat Pirates.

abilities.description: A one-sword style technique where Zoro launches a crescent moon-like projectile of compressed air at his opponent with great speed, similar to Sanjuroku Pound Ho.

name.japanese: ホーディ・ジョーンズ

keyMoments.title: Hody Reveals Plan to Revive Arlong's Dream
keyMoments.description: Hody reveals that he joined Neptune's army only to gain military strength and knowledge, and declares his true intention to revive the dream and ambition of Arlong.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Hody's motivation and connection to the Arlong Park arc, showing that Arlong's extremist ideology has inspired a new generation.
keyMoments.quote: I will revive the dream and ambition of Arlong!

keyMoments.title: Hody Uses Yabusame
keyMoments.description: Hody demonstrates his Fish-Man Karate technique Yabusame, throwing water droplets or air bubbles with tremendous force to create deadly arrows. A silhouette of Arlong appears over him during the technique.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Hody's mastery of Fish-Man Karate and his connection to Arlong's legacy.

keyMoments.title: Hody Uses Soshark
keyMoments.description: Hody uses Soshark to crush the walls of Ryugu Palace with his tremendous strength and grip, allowing water to flood the palace.
keyMoments.significance: Creates a tactical advantage by flooding the palace and demonstrates Hody's ruthlessness.

keyMoments.title: Hody Floods Ryugu Palace
keyMoments.description: Hody declares his intention to destroy both Neptune's army and the Straw Hat Pirates, then proceeds to flood Ryugu Palace, creating a dire situation for everyone who cannot breathe underwater.
keyMoments.significance: Represents a critical escalation in Hody's attack and demonstrates his willingness to endanger even his own allies.
keyMoments.quote: I will destroy the army and the Straw Hats!

abilities.description: Hody wets his arm then uses massive strength to throw many drops of water (or air bubbles when underwater) which are converted into deadly arrows through kinetic force.
Hody uses his tremendous strength and grip to crush large walls of stone.

relationships.description: Hody idolizes Arlong and seeks to revive his dream of Fish-Man supremacy over humans.

evolutionMoments.description: Hody declares his intention to revive Arlong's dream and ambition, revealing the depth of his devotion to Arlong's ideology.

reveals.information: Joined Neptune's army only to gain military strength and knowledge to further his own agenda
Seeks to revive the dream and ambition of Arlong

keyMoments.title: Nami's Reaction to Arlong's Name
keyMoments.description: When Hody Jones declares his intention to revive Arlong's dream, Nami is visibly shocked and disturbed, showing the lasting trauma from her past enslavement under Arlong.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that despite her growth and freedom, the mention of Arlong still affects Nami deeply, adding emotional weight to the conflict with Hody Jones.

keyMoments.title: Nami Escapes with Camie
keyMoments.description: Taking advantage of Hody's distraction during his speech, Nami successfully escapes from Ryugu Palace with Camie, avoiding being trapped when Hody floods the palace.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Nami's quick thinking and survival instincts, as well as her protective nature toward Camie.

keyMoments.title: Robin Arrives at the Sea Forest
keyMoments.description: Robin ventures into the Sea Forest in search of ancient secrets and historical knowledge, arriving where the Thousand Sunny is docked and setting out to search for the Poneglyph.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up Robin's discovery of the Joy Boy Poneglyph, a crucial piece of One Piece lore about the Void Century.

keyMoments.title: Robin Searches for the Poneglyph
keyMoments.description: Robin explores the Sea Forest on the path to discovering the Poneglyph that contains Joy Boy's apology to the people of Fish-Man Island.
keyMoments.significance: This is crucial to One Piece's overarching narrative, as the Joy Boy Poneglyph provides insight into the Void Century and Fish-Man Island's role in world history.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Branded as Royal Kidnapper
keyMoments.description: As Luffy travels with Shirahoshi (hidden inside Megalo), the citizens of Fish-Man Island spot them together and brand him as a kidnapper of their beloved princess.
keyMoments.significance: Creates tension between Luffy and the Fish-Man Island citizens, demonstrating their protective nature toward Shirahoshi and distrust of humans.

keyMoments.title: Usopp Uses Midori Boshi: Rafflesia
keyMoments.description: Usopp demonstrates his new post-timeskip Pop Green technique Midori Boshi: Rafflesia, which releases a powerful stench that can incapacitate opponents.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Usopp's growth during the two-year timeskip and his new botanical-based fighting style developed on the Boin Archipelago.

abilities.description: A plant-based attack that releases a powerful stench from the Rafflesia flower that can incapacitate opponents.

keyMoments.title: Shirahoshi Spotted with Luffy
keyMoments.description: Shirahoshi is spotted traveling with Luffy by the citizens of Fish-Man Island, leading to Luffy being branded as a kidnapper.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the protective nature of Fish-Men toward their princess and creates additional conflict for Luffy.

keyMoments.title: Neptune Pleads During Hody's Speech
keyMoments.description: Neptune, captured and bound, begs someone to protect his daughter as Hody reveals his true intentions and mocks Neptune's weakness.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Neptune's vulnerability and his primary concern for Shirahoshi's safety despite his own dire situation.

keyMoments.title: Dosun's Childhood Flashback
keyMoments.description: An anime-original flashback shows Dosun as a child being kidnapped by pirates. Hody and the future officers of the New Fish-Man Pirates attempt to rescue him but are beaten down until Arlong saves them.
keyMoments.significance: Provides context for Hody's devotion to Arlong and shows how Arlong's actions inspired a generation of Fish-Man children, explaining the origins of their extremist ideology.

reveals.information: Was kidnapped by pirates as a child and saved by Arlong, which inspired his loyalty to the New Fish-Man Pirates

keyMoments.title: Camie Escapes with Nami
keyMoments.description: Camie escapes from Ryugu Palace together with Nami during Hody's speech, avoiding being trapped when the palace floods.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Camie being protected by Nami and demonstrates the bonds formed between the Straw Hats and their Fish-Man Island allies.

keyMoments.title: Brook Helps Free the Soldiers
keyMoments.description: Zoro instructs Brook and Usopp to help free Neptune's soldiers who are trapped in the flooding palace.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Straw Hats working together to save lives even during a dangerous battle.
